subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: If the Mets expect to rise in the standings this season, they will need John Maine to prove that his 2007 season, when he won 15 games and struck out 180 batters, was no fluke.
snippet: If the Mets expect to rise in the standings this season, they will need John Maine to prove that his 2007 season, when he won 15 games and struck out 180 batters, was no fluke.
